name: Banette
author: Eri Yamaki
flavor_text: Strong feelings of hatred turned a puppet into a Pokémon. If it opens its mouth, its cursed energy escapes.

abilities.name: Red Eyes
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may put a Basic Pokémon from your opponent’s discard pile onto their Bench.

attacks.name: Enemy Show
attacks.effect: For each of your opponent’s Pokémon in play, put 1 damage counter on your opponent’s Pokémon in any way you like.
